function.name: execute_and_validate_script
function.description: Execute a script (Python or AHK) and validate its output. For Python, runs in venv and logs output. For AHK, validates syntax and runs if possible.

script_path.description: The path to the script file to execute (e.g., .py or .ahk).

script_type.description: The type of script: 'python' for .py, 'ahk' for AutoHotkey.
